reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

description.narrative: Contributo volontario all'UNDP che opera in circa 170 paesi e territori, aiutando a sradicare la povertà, ridurre le disuguaglianze e l'esclusione e costruire la resilienza in modo che i paesi possano sostenere il progresso. In qualità di agenzia per lo sviluppo delle Nazioni Unite, l'UNDP svolge un ruolo fondamentale nell'aiutare i paesi a raggiungere gli obiettivi di sviluppo sostenibile.

Voluntary contribution to United Nations Development Programme that works in about 170 countries and territories, helping to eradicate poverty, reduce inequalities and exclusion, and build resilience so countries can sustain progress. As the UN’s development agency, UNDP plays a critical role in helping countries achieve the Sustainable Development Goals, that are considered priority areas for Italian cooperation.

participating-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development
UNDP - UNITED NATIONS DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMME ALT

organisation.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
By 2030, reduce at least by half the proportion of men, women and children of all ages living in poverty in all its dimensions according to national definitions
Encourage and promote effective public, public-private and civil society partnerships, building on the experience and resourcing strategies of partnerships
End all forms of discrimination against all women and girls everywhere
End poverty in all its forms everywhere
Facilitate orderly, safe, regular and responsible migration and mobility of people, including through the implementation of planned and well-managed migration policies
Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Reduce inequality within and among countries

Strengthen relevant national institutions, including through international cooperation, for building capacity at all levels, in particular in developing countries, to prevent violence and combat terrorism and crime
Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the global partnership for sustainable development

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
